description: Kotlin data models aligned with the FastAPI backend OpenAPI schema, representing weather data, location info, and API responses.

classes.name: Coordinates
classes.description: Represents geographical coordinates with latitude and longitude.

classes.name: Location
classes.description: Contains details about a geographical location including name, country, state, and coordinates.

classes.name: CurrentWeather
classes.description: Models current weather conditions, including temperature, wind, and weather conditions.

classes.name: CurrentWeatherResponse
classes.description: Encapsulates the response containing location and current weather data.

classes.name: DailyForecastItem
classes.description: Represents a daily weather forecast with date and temperature range.

classes.name: HourlyForecastItem
classes.description: Represents an hourly weather forecast with timestamp and conditions.

classes.name: ForecastResponse
classes.description: Contains forecast data, including location, daily and hourly forecasts.

classes.name: LocationSearchItem
classes.description: Represents a location search result, including ID, name, and coordinates.

classes.name: LocationSearchResponse
classes.description: Wraps a list of location search results.

classes.name: ReverseGeocodeResponse
classes.description: Represents the response from reverse geocoding API.
